name.bn: One click IG Follower Export Tool (Email)

short.ar: The IG Tools can export IG followers and following to Excel/CSV/JSON formats with one click.
short.am: One click to scrape user profile with email from Instagram followers and followings and export to CSV.
short.bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: IGFollow extract Instagram follower and following including Emails, Export to Excel/CSV/JSON with one click.
short.fr: IGFollow extrait les abonnÃ©s Instagram et les suivants, y compris les e-mails, exporte vers Excel/CSV/JSON en un seul clic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically download IG followers and following.
The best extension for outreach to competitors' followers and Instagram Email extraction.

HOW TO GET STARTED?
After installing this extension, there will be a one-click export button at the top of each post on the IG page; click this button to start the download.

ğŸ”¥ Upgrade
âœ”ï¸ Save export history to local storage
âœ”ï¸ Continue task progress from history

#FEATURES
âœ“ Unlimited Followers / Following Export
âœ“ Extract IG Email address
âœ“ One Click to Export Followers for IG
âœ“ Export data to XLS(Excel)/CSV/JSON
âœ“ Automatically download when data is ready
âœ“ Random Interval range and wait for a period, useful for downloading large amounts of data
âœ“ Automatically Error Handling for 403, 429, and 400 error message

#FAQ
https://igfollowexporter.extensionsfox.com/#faq
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@extensionsfox.com.

#DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you exported.
